items.title: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT): Among the Stocks Analysts Are Upgrading Today
items.description: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Stocks Analysts Are Upgrading Today. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) stands against the other stocks analysts are upgrading today. The easing of the US-China trade war is the catalyst driving equity markets higher after weeks of heightened volatility.
